title: Pet Friendly! Dedicated Artist Loft with FREE Laundry
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #204 is a lovely studio apartment on the second floor. You enter the unit into into a hallway with a closet for additional storage. The spacious living area is L-shaped and offers hardwood floors and large windows along one wall for great natural light. There is tons of space for a bedroom and living room set up. The stunning kitchen features bar seating available at the counter, tile backsplash cabinetry above and below, an oven with electric cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. There is an pantry area behind the kitchen for more storage options. Your full bathroom boasts sleek tiling, a shower/tub combo, and a vanity. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

title: Beautiful One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Studio w/ Roof deck, Dog Friendly, W/D & Central AC May
description:
Please reach out to my Property Manager, James, to schedule a tour james @ ocfrealty . com
https://www.ocfrealty.com/properties/1300-s-19th-st-unit-219
Available as soon as May 2022 - stunning studio, one of the more unique units in the newly renovated Smith School. This studio, 1 bathroom actually features architecture from the original auditorium! As you step inside, you’ll notice the breathtaking arch over the raised platform, the hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and oversized windows that illuminate the entire studio. The kitchen features quartz countertops, white cabinets against textured subway tile backsplash, garbage disposal, and stainless steel appliances. The bathroom has a quartz top vanity and tub/shower with a glass door. The Walter George Smith Public School, listed on the National Register of Historic Places, has undergone an amazing transformation to bring you these apartments! Each unit features high-end finishes while preserving it’s historic character such as the chalkboards, original trim and closets, and overall unique floor plan. All tenants will have access to the three outdoor spaces (over half an acre combined!) on the ground floor and mezzanine patios, and a roof deck with stellar skyline views! Located at 19th and Wharton in Point Breeze, you’re on the 17 SEPTA bus route, 5 minute walk fro the Broad Street line subway, minutes from PHARMACY Coffee House, Two Eagles Cafe, On Point Bistro, Rosarios Pizza, Community Bar, American Sardine Bar, Dock Street Brewery, The Lincoln Road Shopping Center (CVS, Target, Chipotle, Sprouts, Insomnia Cookies) Graduate Hospital, East Passyunk and MORE! Building is dog friendly!

title: Newly Renovated Summer Rental or Office in Quiet West Philly Home
description:
If you are looking for a peaceful, nourishing, well cared-for place to live (and/or work) this summer, check out this apartment! The space is a newly renovated, lower level apartment of a sweet West Philly Victorian. Super quiet, all windows face away from the street. Direct Access to back garden. Located on a quiet tree-lined street with lovely neighbors, the house is walking distance to Green Line Locust, Clark Park, and Penn's campus.
I am a 35 year old artist and educator. I own the house and live and have my healing/wellness studio on the first two floors. The apartment is it's own private lockable space, and shares an entrance with my part of the house where there is a possibility I will host an occasional low-key community gathering. Living here is ideal for someone who is grounded, responsible, and has an appreciation for creating a life of well-being.
Features/Details:
-New Hardwood Floors
-Lots of Natural Light
-Bathroom with new Ceramic Tile and Clawfoot Tub
-Large Front Room suitable as bedroom or living room
-Center Bedroom or Office

-Free laundry in Building

title: Leasing Special: Amazing 2BD Home w. Basement & Fireplace
description:
Welcome to 777 S 3rd St #D! This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom trinity townhouse features exposed wood rafters, a working fireplace, hardwood floors, and unique architecture throughout the space. Enter on the first floor with a great living area offering custom built-in shelving and a large window for natural light. Your rustic kitchen is located on the lower level of the home. Kitchen features include tile flooring, wood cabinetry, under-cabinet lighting, and appliances including dishwasher, gas range, refrigerator, and in-unit laundry. Head upstairs to the second floor to view your first bedroom with a window and closet space. Your full bathroom is also on this floor with tile flooring, shower/tub combo, vanity, and overhead cabinets for additional storage space. The upper-level loft boasts a working fireplace, great natural light, high ceilings with exposed wood rafters, and access to a balcony that overlooks the lovely side street below. Please note: lower level kitchen ceiling is low, approximately 6-foot clearance. Schedule your tour today!

title: Wonderful 1BD Home with Patio/Yard, Dishwasher - Available Now
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,675/month for 12 month lease; or $1,650/month for 24 month lease.
Welcome to 2610 Cedar St! This lovely 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom row home is situated on the end of the row with a private full lot side-yard complete with a flower garden, a wooden deck, and a patio with room for entertaining! Enter the home into the living area with large windows at the front for natural sunlight and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort. The straight back floor plan flows back past the dining area with room for a large table. The kitchen is separated by a breakfast bar with seating for two, and has an abundance of cabinet and counter space. There’s a window over the sink, white subway tile backsplash, a stainless steel gas range, garbage disposal, microwave, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to view two bedrooms with wall-to-wall carpeting and good closet space. The front bedroom is about twice the size of the other and features a ceiling fan and tons of natural light! title: Three story Victorian style home ! 4BR 2.5BA. Act quickly!
description:
The home is an immaculately kept three story Victorian style home located in the historic Cooper Plaza neighborhood of Camden. This unique dwelling has four bedrooms, two full bathrooms and one half bath. Unlike most homes in this neighborhood, the home has a rear patio, large yard (50’x50’), and a driveway that will accommodate three cars. The interior has wall to wall Berber carpet with exception of ceramic tile floors in the kitchen and bathrooms. The residence has central air conditioning for your comfort, and comes with a stove and kitchen appliances. Each bedroom has a walk-in closet and the third floor bedroom boast an owner’s suite with a large bedroom with a full bathroom and large closet. There is a full basement with plenty of storage space and includes a washer and dryer and a sump pump. The windows at the home are equipped with custom wrought iron gates and there is a security system installed. For added safety there are hard wired battery - backed smoke detectors as well as a sprinkler system. This lovely home is located a half block from the Cooper Hospital / Rowan University Medical School. Rutgers University Nursing School, Rutgers Camden main campus and Camden County College are only a few blocks away. About a mile away are the Camden Water Front attractions; Camden Water Park, Spruce Street Harbor Park, Camden Children’s Garden Park, Adventure Aquarium, Battleship New Jersey, the Waterfront Music Pavilion, Hilton Garden Inn Hotel and restaurants. Also nearby are several new charter schools and public schools. Add your phone number to reply so i can easily contact with you..
The Camden Municipal Court, Camden County Hall of Justice and the Federal Court facility are minutes from the property. The home is also close to the bridges to Pennsylvania, major highways and shopping centers throughout the area. The Walter Rand Transportation Center is within walking distance of the property giving the new owner access to buses, and the PATCO train to Philadelphia and the New Jersey Riverline train to Trenton connecting them to New York and other locations.

description:
Available NOW:
Welcome to 230 Fountain St! This gorgeous 4 bedroom / 4.5 bathroom is a newly constructed multi-level townhome and is ready to welcome you home! Stunning features include uncovered parking spot, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, modern finishes, fireplace, THREE outdoor spaces, and more! Enter into the straight-back floor plan with a giant window at the front that douses the room in sunlight, a marble fireplace, and custom built cabinetry & shelving for ample storage options. Continue back past the dining area and into the kitchen boasting gray shaker cabinets above & below, subway tile backsplash, and high end stainless steel appliances including a 6 burner gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator with water dispenser, and two ovens. Continue upstairs on the second level which features a smaller bedroom with closet, a full bathroom off of the hallway with a subway tiled shower / tub combo, and a larger bedroom towards the front with great natural light, a walk-in closet, and an en suite full bathroom. The third level is the primary suite with additional dry bar. The bedroom is spacious with a private deck, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom surrounded in marble tile with soaking tub, dual vanities, & standing glass shower.
